A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a mess - From Leia in space to Snoke being a bit thick. The story has no coherence\, no arc.  Critics normally have a more informed view of what comprises a good film.  Not so with Star Wars - this is different\, it belongs to the fans. Abrams understood that - Johnson doesn't. All the good work of Awakens undone. Star Wars has died along with a character loosely resembling Luke Skywalker. RIP.
